document.stem: The Devices card in the Advanced View displays the number of devices connected to:
document.p: To open the Devices page, click the Devices card in the Advanced View .
The Devices page contains the following settings:
document.li1:
Status:
Displays whether the device is currently connected or not. A green bullet indicates that the device is currently connected to the network.

Hostname:
The name assigned to the device.

IP address:
The IP address that is currently used by the device.

MAC address:
The unique hexadecimal code that identifies a device on a network. Each network-enabled device has at least one unique MAC address.

Type:
The connection method used to connect the device. This can either be ethernet or wireless.

Port:
If the device is connected to an ethernet port. The port number will be listed here.
